00068 class InternalErr: public Error {
00069

00127 // Revision 1.4  2000/09/21 16:22:08  jimg
00128 // Merged changes from Jose Garcia that add exceptions to the software.
00129 // Many methods that returned error codes now throw exectptions. There are
00130 // two classes which are thrown by the software, Error and InternalErr.
00131 // InternalErr is used to report errors within the library or errors using
00132 // the library. Error is used to reprot all other errors. Since InternalErr
00133 // is a subclass of Error, programs need only to catch Error.
